display_block_below_price.label: Display Block below Price
display_block_below_price.comment: Display tax info and shipping cost link below the price on all pages

including_shipping_costs.label: Show "incl. Shipping Cost" instead of "excl. Shipping Cost"

content_responsable_press_law.label: Responsible in the interests of the press law

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png.

vat_value.label: VAT value
vat_value.comment: Possible values: percent value - integer or float number ex 19 or 19.5; default value: 24.

add_tagging.label: Add GA Tagging to product URL

tagging_params.label: Add custom Tagging to product URL

description_length.label: Description length
description_length.comment: Used when description is set to "Fixed number of characters"

currency.label: Get prices in specified currency
currency.comment: Possible values: RON, USD, EUR etc.

display_currency.label: Display currency code
display_currency.comment: Force the display of certain currency code. Possible values: RON, USD, EUR etc.

grouped_main.label: Show main product data for grouped products (grouped, bundle, configurable)

show_associated_products.label: Show simple associated products used in bundle and grouped products

in_site_filter.label: Use in store filter for multiple stores

logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png.

vat_value.comment: Possible values: percent value - integer or float number ex 19 or 19.5; default value: 24.

logo_width.label: Logo Width
logo_width.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

logo_height.label: Logo Height
